docs.text: How to build this site This site is built with a combination of github pages and mkdocs-material. Why Markdown? Markdown is used because it will outlive virtually any other format its universal - support has made its way into nearly everything its simple which keeps focus on writing less decisions = less cognitive overhead Why MKDOCS? simple quick to get started static site good features search built in Prereqs Install python Install pip install mkdocs-material Setting up mkdocs.yml Building site mkdocs build or python3 -m mkdocs build cd ..\<page name> git add * git commit -a -m "<commit message>" git push
